descriptions.name: structured
descriptions.description: The 'Basic' debate allows user to create comments for and/or against the main debate statement. Users can also reply to any comment, replies are not tagged as for/against. User cannot vote on the debate until voting is enabled. Admin/moderators can open voting. When voting is open users can vote and reply but not create original for/against comments. When voting is closed, votes will be displayed (if votes have been made). When the debate is closed users cannot comment, reply or vote.

descriptions.name: forAgainst
descriptions.description: The For/Against debate allows user to create comments for and/or against the main debate statement. Users cannot vote or reply to comments, only create original comments.
